statements: SELECT * FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions;
SELECT institution_id, research_focus FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions;
SELECT * FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT institution_name, research_focus FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions WHERE institution_id = 1
SELECT institution_name, location FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions WHERE research_focus LIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT * FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions ORDER BY institution_id DESC
SELECT MAX(institution_id) AS max_id FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions
SELECT institution_name AS name, location AS loc, research_focus AS focus FROM StemCellResearchInstitutions
SELECT * FROM stemcell_research_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM stemcell_research_institutions;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, lead_researcher, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date < DATE(NOW());

SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) as project_count FROM stemcell_research_institutions LEFT JOIN research_projects ON stemcell_research_institutions.institution_id = research_projects.institution_id GROUP BY institution_id;
SELECT * FROM stemcell_research_institutions ORDER BY institution_name ASC;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM stemcell_research_institutions WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT project_name, lead_researcher, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE lead_researcher LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) AS project_count FROM stemcell_research_institutions JOIN research_projects ON stemcell_research_institutions.institution_id = research_projects.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name ORDER BY project_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Institutions ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Institutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, title FROM Researchers WHERE institution_id = 2 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, title, description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE researcher_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Institutions;
SELECT name, location FROM Institutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, name, title FROM Researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT id, title, start_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE title LIKE '%AI%';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT finding_description FROM findings WHERE project_id = 2 AND researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE preservation_method = 'Freezing' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution='University XYZ';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, researcher_id FROM projects JOIN findings ON projects.project_id = findings.project_id;
SELECT DISTINCT institution FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM Institutes;
SELECT institute_name, address FROM Institutes WHERE institute_id = 1;
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT sample_type FROM DataSamples WHERE researcher_id = 3 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT project_title, sharing_institute_id, permission_level FROM ResearchProjects JOIN DataSharing ON ResearchProjects.project_id = DataSharing.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Institutes;
SELECT institute_name, address FROM Institutes ORDER BY institute_id DESC;
SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, ResearchProjects.project_title FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchProjects ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearchProjects.researcher_id;
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DataSamples.sample_type, DataSharing.permission_level FROM DataSamples JOIN DataSharing ON DataSamples.project_id = DataSharing.project_id;
